channel.title: [508]adding objects or npc's [508]
channel.description: Hey, i was wondering, how could i spawn and place an object or npc to my 508 blue dds source. I tried : ::object <id> it spawned, but it doesn't stay there. I tried : ::npc <id> it spawned, but it goes walking around and disappears in a while. Can someone help me to make it stay there for ever? Please help :(
